quote_first: “I have received your name from the Skilled Women’s Agency together with their recommendation. I understand they know you personally. I shall be glad to pay you the salary you ask and shall expect you to take up your duties on August 8th. The train is the
quote_last: from Paddington and you will be met at Oakbridge station. I enclose five pound notes for expenses.”
title: And Then There Were None
author: Agatha Christie

quote_first: A little ormolu clock in the outer corridor indicated
quote_last: . The car was due at one-fifteen. Thirty-five minutes: oh, to escape for only that brief period!
title: Extremely Entertaining Short Stories (The Octave of Jealousy)
author: Stacy Aumonier
